lines.text:
[Gravedigger sees Norman the dog and screams]
He won't hurt you.
Who said that?
Me
Oh.
Yeah, that's just Norman, he wouldn't hurt anybody.
But... you were over there!
No, that was me.

[Screams]
You're at two places at the same time!
We're twins, silly.
Oh... ohh... twins! Oh, twins!
Do you drink a lot of coffee?
You might want to switch to decaf.

[coming into the witches' gathering]
These people have been reading too much Stephen King.
Remember when fairy tales used to keep me awake?
Yeah.
Well, if we get out of this I'll be awake until I'm 21!
Faster, faster! We're almost there. Then I'll throw you into the mirror, too. You'll never see your parents again or that mangy mutt of yours.
You are so cranky! Get a life!
Cross your heart... hope to die... stick a needle in your eye, shake your bottom if you got 'em.
...Even if it means being a crow for the rest of your life?
Even if it means being a crow for the rest of my life!
Go get your shotgun, George. We're going crow-hunting!
Hunt this, ugly!
[flies out the window]
